Ingredients.9: 0.5 cup vegan Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's®)

Directions.1: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place cauliflower florets in a large bowl. Pour egg substitute over the florets and stir to coat.

Directions.3: Mix flour, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper in a large plastic resealable bag. Zip and shake until evenly combined.

Directions.4: Drop 1/2 of the florets into the seasoned flour. Zip and shake to coat. Place florets in the basket of the air fryer. Spray tops with nonstick cooking spray.

Directions.5: Air fry for 5 minutes. Flip cauliflower over, spray any chalky spots, and cook for 5 minutes more. Repeat with remaining cauliflower florets.

Directions.6: Meanwhile, heat buffalo wing sauce in a saucepan over medium heat until warm. Transfer cauliflower to a large bowl. Pour wing sauce over the top and toss until evenly coated. Serve immediately.
